title: Skinny Mug Brownies
directions: Mix all ingredients together in a mug with a fork.
Microwave for about 30 seconds. Do NOT over bake – or it will turn out like a dry chocolate sponge. The brownie will be done when bubbles form at the top – but still looks wet.
The brownie will be HOT. Let it stand for a few minutes – and enjoy your guilt-free treat!
ingredients: 1 Tablespoon applesauce or yogurt – any variety (I used a fat free light vanilla yogurt – you could also use a plain Greek, or even a fruit-flavored yogurt)
2 Tablespoons agave nectar or honey (I used an organic blue agave nectar)
2 Tablespoons flour (I used 1 T white, 1 T whole-wheat)
1 Tablespoon egg white (If doubling, use one whole egg white)
